text: You can create timeline events using an app api

Hello developers,

Please, someone who can help me on this <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Remove-properties-of-the-requiredProperties-field-in-a-custom/td-p/516868|post> in the hubstpo community?

Hey everyone, does anyone have experience pulling from the */engagements/v1/engagements/recent/modified* end-point?

Unfortunately there's still no V3 search for Engagements so I'm stuck trying to use this to get recently (last day's worth) of updated Engagements but it is exceeding 10,000 record limit.
The main question/issue I have is that when I look at the results I'm getting I see stuff with LastModified 2 weeks back.

Example request: <https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/recent/modified?count=100&Since=1635264552580&offset=9000>

*Requested "Since" Unix Time & Converted DateTime*
1635264552580 -> 2021-10-27 20:47:40

*Sample Response Record "LastUpdated" Unix Time & Converted DateTime*
1633965101012 -> 2021-10-11 15:11:41

Why am I getting records that have been updated prior to the requested "Since". Anyone else experience this and have a workaround for it?
It would also help if I could only query for results of a certain engagement type since I'm not interested in things like "EMAIL".
Having the same issue here. All I hear is that the new V3 API is in the works but after over a year there seems to be no progress or updates on it.

Hey friends. My company has an integration with another CRM platform in which a user creates a "report" and the API can directly consume that object, mapping the aggregated report metrics into our platform. Is there any way to do this with the HubSpot CRM API? I looked into the Analytics API documentation but it does not seem to offer the capabilities I'm looking for.
Now I am looking at the events API, and trying to use it, but its saying I need to use Oauth authentication? Why cant I just use token authenticatio?
I am not trying to make a shareable app
